name: Joe McGuire
review: This is an excellent church and body of believers. Although we don't live in the area ww have attended this church on several occasions. Very warm congregation and beautiful worship service. The pastor and elders are very committed to teaching the full counsel of God as it is given to us in the Bible.

name: Kevin Moon
review: Great services with Pastor Tom. Nice friendly congregation and a beautiful building.

name: Diane Clements
review: I am a member at Calvary and appreciate the biblically based preaching.

name: Anthony Lewis
review: Shout out to the Sun keep shining I ain't mad at you
